CustomField.description:
This Stage will be calculated based on FLO Customization Records created against the ones the FLO scanner count.
VERIFIED: Means the counts match RESCANNER: Means the type should be selected on the scanner page and rescanned. DEDUPLICATE: Means that the deduplicate tool should be run. NOT DETECTED: Means that no records of that type have been located.
CustomField.formula: IF( FLODocs__Scanner_Count__c = FLODocs__Documented_Record_Count__c, "VERIFIED", IF(FLODocs__Documented_Record_Count__c < FLODocs__Scanner_Count__c,"RESCANNER", IF(FLODocs__Documented_Record_Count__c > FLODocs__Scanner_Count__c,"DEDUPLICATE","NOT DETECTED")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Stage will be calculated based on FLO Customization Records created against the ones the FLO scanner count. For more information see Field description.
CustomField.label: Customization Stage
